Package model

Interface ICalendarModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
CalendarModel
public interface ICalendarModel
Interface for the calendar model that stores and retrieves events.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addEvent(Event event, boolean autoDecline)
    Adds an event to the model.
    List<Event>
    getAllEvents()
    Returns all events in the calendar.
    List<Event>
    getEventsOn(LocalDate date)
    Returns all events scheduled on the given date.
    boolean
    isBusyAt(LocalDateTime dateTime)
    Checks whether the calendar is busy at a specific date and time.

  • Method Details

    • addEvent

      void addEvent(Event event, boolean autoDecline) throws EventConflictException
      Adds an event to the model.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to add
      autoDecline - whether conflicting events should be auto-declined
      Throws:
      EventConflictException - if the event conflicts with an existing one

    • getEventsOn

      List<Event> getEventsOn(LocalDate date)
      Returns all events scheduled on the given date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to search
      Returns:
      list of events

    • getAllEvents

      List<Event> getAllEvents()
      Returns all events in the calendar.
      Returns:
      list of all events

    • isBusyAt

      boolean isBusyAt(LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Checks whether the calendar is busy at a specific date and time.
      Parameters:
      dateTime - the date-time to check
      Returns:
      true if there is a conflict, false otherwise
